item.title: Containers: The Backstory
item.description: Back in my student days, I first bumped into Docker. It was all the rage then, and honestly, it blew my mind. The idea that you could take a piece of code, make it work anywhere in its own little space, separate from the computer’s main system â€“ that was pretty cool. Later on, I found out Docker wasn’t the first to come up with this container and isolation stuff. In this blog post, I want to take you on a little trip back in time to check out who started it all.
